block.p: Stephanie Pollack Singer and William S. Miller are to be married today by Rabbi Richard Jacobs at the Westchester Reform Temple in Scarsdale, N.Y.

The bride is an account manager at the West Group, an online legal research business in Manhattan. She graduated from Smith College. She is the daughter of Judge Milton Pollack of Manhattan and the late Lillian K. Pollack, and the stepdaughter of Moselle B. Pollack. Her father sits on the Federal District Court in Manhattan.
Stephanie Pollack Singer and William S. Miller are to be married today by Rabbi Richard Jacobs at the Westchester Reform Temple in Scarsdale, N.Y.

The bride is an account manager at the West Group, an online legal research business in Manhattan. She graduated from Smith College. She is the daughter of Judge Milton Pollack of Manhattan and the late Lillian K. Pollack, and the stepdaughter of Moselle B. Pollack. Her father sits on the Federal District Court in Manhattan.

The bridegroom retired as the president and principal owner of the Miller Cardboard Corporation, a manufacturing company in Manhattan that was founded by his father, the late Mark Miller. The bridegroom graduated from Harvard University, from which he received an M.B.A. He is also the son of the late Cecile Miller.
The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce; the bridegroom was a widower.
